title: i got messages from riot games mid game
body:
these messages werent from any actual staff but ill type up what it looked like in my chat
[Riot Games]: Pantheon is BOOSTED
[Riot Games]: Pantheon is gay
all this while i did alright with pantheon so im pretty confused is it just some mod fucking with me or someone playing with the code or am i going insane?
{{champion:80}} op

replies.body:
From the sounds of it, it looks like you are getting trolled by one of your friends.  Riot will never contact you in the client or in-game like that (as you already pointed out), so it looks like someone is trying to spoof Riot and have their name appear a certain way when they message.

If you see something like this again, feel free to take a screenshot so we can look into it further!
Hey, just wanted to point out you might have meant to write "trolled by one of your friends", instead of "trolled by one of our friends" which does imply riot shenanigans.

if this ever happens again ill screenshot and it wasn't really aggressive or flaming it was just messin around
also forgot to say it was white NOT like normal chat messages

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZfWQU-a1F8Y

Here is a video of it happening to someone else. Although, they made people flash, so it actually had an effect on the game.

It honestly looks like someone is using a 3rd party program to tap into our Chat Servers that can send messages to other players with spoofed names.  I believe you still need to be friends with someone for this to happen, so its also possible someone on your friends list lost access to their account...or its just a master troll.

Actually, NoFatAsiansPls just put at least the right amount of spaces after "glhf \*\***" which pushed the rest of his message to the second line. This is, while oftentimes just a harmless joke, used to scam players by making them think they got message from Riot or a system message like "Enemy team surrendered 4 to 5".

This has been brought up before but no action taken.
i had a ranked game turn into a 4v5 because of that shit. someone was like, server is restarting in x minutes, leave the game.

Wow...you dont honestly know how spacing works to move a line downwards?
Here lets give it a try                                                                                                                                                          

oh wow it worked.
Correct this is a chat trick u put. A ton of space and start the next line with typing [riot games ]
